title: Bug 108822: Enhanced logic expected for disk sorting when there is a border value for row value
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Sort the data on disk with 40000 rows. 
2. Configure the program to process the data less than 40000. 
3. Save the file as a temporary file on disk. 
4. Load the file into memory. 
5. Perform sorting on the data. 
6. Save the sorted data back to a temporary file.
